rules.ruleString: Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {CSE3000, FIT3118, FIT4038}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {CSE2132, FIT1004} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}

description: This unit extends the study from FIT1004 Data management. FIT2077 will introduce more advanced concepts in the areas of database design, SQL, query optimisation and the handling of unstructured data (XML) both externally and within a database. The issue of "Big Data" and the role played by BI technologies and data warehouses will be explored.
